name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: Whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is on the earth glorifies Allah. And He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: O you who believe! Why do you say that which you do not do?

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: Most hateful it is with Allah that you say that which you do not do.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: Verily, Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in rows (ranks) as if they were a solid structure.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: And (remember) when Musa (Moses) said to his people: "O my people! Why do you hurt me while you know certainly that I am the Messenger of Allah to you? So when they turned away (from the Path of Allah), Allah turned their hearts away (from the Right Path). And Allah guides not the people who are Fasiqun (rebellious, disobedient to Allah).

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: And (remember) when 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary), said: "O Children of Israel! I am the Messenger of Allah unto you confirming the Taurat [(Torah) which came] before me, and giving glad tidings of a Messenger to come after me, whose name shall be Ahmad. But when he (Ahmad i.e. Muhammad SAW) came to them with clear proofs, they said: "This is plain magic."

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: And who does more wrong than the one who invents a lie against Allah, while he is being invited to Islam? And Allah guides not the people who are Zalimun (polytheists, wrong-doers and disbelievers) folk.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: They intend to put out the Light of Allah (i.e. the religion of Islam, this Quran, and Prophet Muhammad SAW) with their mouths. But Allah will complete His Light even though the disbelievers hate (it).

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: He it is Who has sent His Messenger (Muhammad SAW) with guidance and the religion of truth (Islamic Monotheism) to make it victorious over all (other) religions even though the Mushrikun (polytheists, pagans, idolaters, and disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah and in His Messenger Muhammed SAW) hate (it).

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: O You who believe! Shall I guide you to a commerce that will save you from a painful torment.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: That you believe in Allah and His Messenger (Muhammad SAW), and that you strive hard and fight in the Cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives, that will be better for you, if you but know!

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: (If you do so) He will forgive you your sins, and admit you into Gardens under which rivers flow, and pleasant dwelling in Gardens of 'Adn - Eternity ['Adn (Edn) Paradise], that is indeed the great success.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: And also (He will give you) another (blessing) which you love, help from Allah (against your enemies) and a near victory. And give glad tidings (O Muhammad SAW) to the believers.

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: O you who believe! Be you helpers (in the Cause) of Allah as said 'Iesa (Jesus), son of Maryam (Mary), to Al-Hawariun (the disciples): "Who are my helpers (in the Cause) of Allah?" Al-Hawarieen (the disciples) said: "We are Allah's helpers" (i.e. we will strive in His Cause!). Then a group of the Children of Israel believed and a group disbelieved. So We gave power to those who believed against their enemies, and they became the uppermost.
